ygData.subject: Tooting flutes (was: Re: Char Catillion)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Remember that bit about the center of elephants being up high in the model?  Your center is in your waist, and if it s blocked by a counter, you gotta
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 7 Jan 2000, Ryan Honeyman wrote:

> > 1. Counters can get in the way. You'll see a failure message (target is

Remember that bit about the "center" of elephants being up high in the
model? Your "center" is in your waist, and if it's blocked by a counter,
you gotta get to know the shopkeep a little better.

> As with all of our other wind based songs, the flute is utterly
> useless unless it's required (invisiblility).

Disagree. First, last night my wind skill raised while using Strike, so
it's not a case of chant's drum. I have noticed (subjectively) less
resists when using a flute than when not. Fluting definitely works for
carrilon also, once I used it on a dubious and didn't get my flute
equipped before pulse, and she was only indifferent. Repulsed with flute,
and she was amiable.

Athren
